title: Amauropsis sphaeroides
text:
Amauropsis sphaeroides is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="predatory">predatory</a> <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Naticidae">Naticidae</a>, the moon snails.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 15 mm.
Habitat.
Minimum recorded depth is 3185 m. Maximum recorded depth is 4166 m.
